name: Fish N' Ships
description:
Made for Mini Jam 91: UFO!

Created by Shannon Midgley and Chase Sharp

This was our first Game Jam! :)

Take the helm as water-hungry aliens are invading Earth to drain the oceans and take the water back to Mars! Mack, the Fish Mechanic, has rigged up a ship to combat the UFOs attacking the planet. Survive as long as you can, while taking out as many UFOs as possible, to unlock more upgrades and ships to help with your defense of Earth!

Can you attain all of the unlockable upgrades and ships?

Controls:

Pretty simple! Keep in mind you refuel while underwater, and you can't shoot while doing so!

Thank you for playing our game!
